safetyTips: Items will left on you door step, we will ring your doorbell and retreat to a 2 meter distance. If you are collecting items from us only one person will allowed in the shop keeping the two meter distancing at all times.
name: RIGHT TRACK MUSIC
address: Javelin House, Henwood Ind Est, Ashford, TN24 8DE
description: Hi, We are Right Track Music a local independent Ashford business with a physical & online retail store selling musical instruments and accessories. There is no minimum spend, and we are offering a local free delivery service to all local postcodes. We can also arrange to meet you at our shop for you to collect the items you require, observing the current social distancing roles. Look forward to hearing from you.
